text: The Bingo Long Traveling All-Stars & Motor Kings is a 1976 American road comedy movie directed by first time director John Badham and was loosely based on the 1973 novel of the same name by William Brashler. It stars Richard Pryor, James Earl Jones, Billy Dee Williams, Stan Shaw, Tony Burton, Jophery Brown and Ted Ross and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1970s road movies Category:American road movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Badham Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:1970s English-language movies Category:African-American movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:Baseball movies
title: The Bingo Long Traveling All-Stars & Motor Kings
